mapper.insert:
select BOARD_SEQ_BOARD_NO.nextval from dual
insert into KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION(KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, MEMBER_NO, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_WRITE_DATE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_POINT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_ENABLED) values (#{knowledgeQuestionNo}, #{memberNo},#{knowledgeQuestionTitle},#{knowledgeQuestionContent}, #{knowledgeQuestionWriteDate},#{knowledgeQuestionPoint}, 1)
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, M.member_no, M.MEMBER_Nickname, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE, (select count(BOARD_INSIGHT.MEMBER_NO) from BOARD_INSIGHT where BOARD_NO = KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO) as KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_POINT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_WRITE_DATE from KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION join MEMBER M on KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO where KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_ENABLED =1 order by KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO desc ) a where rownum<=#{endRowNum} ) where rnum>=#{startRowNum}

select KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, #{url} || M.MEMBER_PROFILE_IMAGE as member_profile_image, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT, (select count(BOARD_INSIGHT.MEMBER_NO) from BOARD_INSIGHT where BOARD_NO = KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO) as KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_WRITE_DATE, KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_POINT from KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION join MEMBER M on M.MEMBER_NO = KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION.MEMBER_NO where KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO = #{knowledgeQuestionNo}
select count(*) from KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION where member_no=#{memberNo}

SELECT Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT, COALESCE(A.answerCount, 0) AS answerCount FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN ( SELECT KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, COUNT(*) AS answerCount FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER GROUP BY KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO ) A ON Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO = A.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO ORDER BY Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT, COALESCE(A.answerCount, 0) AS answerCount FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN ( SELECT KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, COUNT(*) AS answerCount FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER GROUP BY KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO ) A ON Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO = A.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO ORDER BY Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT DESC OFFSET 5 ROWS FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE, Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT, Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_READ_COUNT,Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_POINT, COALESCE(A.answerCount, 0) AS answerCount FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN ( SELECT KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, COUNT(*) AS answerCount FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER GROUP BY KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO ) A ON Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO = A.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO WHERE Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%' or Q.KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%' ORDER BY COALESCE(A.answerCount, 0) OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
select MEMBER_NO from KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION where KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.delete: delete from KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION where KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO = #{knowledgeQuestionNo} and ROWNUM = 1
